column2: Background correction, between-array quantile normalization, and probe-level summarization using limma version 3.12.3. normalizeOneExperiment.R. Probesets mapping to miRBase release 20 only were included.

Moderated t-statistics computed with limma version 3.12.3. Associated p-values adjusted using Benjamini & Hochberg (1995) FDR correction. By default, significant differential expression called if adjusted p <= 0.05.
